title: Prosenjit Enterprise
details: This Project is made for those people who want to buy a bike
Here, users can sea different types of bikes, user can buy their preferred bike using this system.
After choosing any bike users can book this bike.
Users can select different types of bikes. First, add one then add another
Without LogIn, this system user can't enroll in any bike package
Users can signUp this system through Gmail and email passwords.
This system stores all the information in a database and it runs its server always.

title: Prosenjit Travel
details: This Project is made for those people who want to travel to any tourist spot.
Here, the user can sea different types of travel packages, user can book his preferred package using this system.
After choosing any travel package user can book this travel package.
Users can select different types of packages. First, add one then add another.
Without LogIn, this system user can't enroll in any travel package.
Users can signUp this system through Gmail.
This system stores all the information in a database and it runs its server always.

title: Probashi Kallyan
details: This Project is made for those Bangladeshi people who currently live in aboard.
User can Login this system using email, password as a Bangladeshi immigrant.
In Admin section, admin can add, remove or update all information and check user requests.
Users can Find Nearby people
Users can Can read and post blog
Users can See update notice
Users can Take Appointment from Admin
Users can See update job post
Users can Live chat with Admin(Help Desk)

title: Home Pharma
details: This Project is made for those people who want to buy medicine online.
Here, users can sea different types of medicines, his/her necessary buy from here.
After choosing the selected medicine user can see details about any course.
Users can buy different medicine. First, add to cart a medicine then add another.
Without LogIn, this system user can't buy any medicine.
Users can signUp this system through Google or Email and Password.
This system store all the information in a database

title: Easy English
details: This Project is made for those people who are weak in English Language and Grammer.
Here, users can sea different types, of course, his/her preference course enroll here.
After choosing the selected course user can see details about any course.
Users, can also see about me page
Users can signUp this system through Google or Email and Password.
This system store all the information in a database

title: Bright Mart
details: This Project is one kind of mini ecommerce
Here, users can sea different types, of products, his/her preference course buy from here.
Useres can see details view of every products
After Add to Cart the product price will added in cart
Users can search product here
